channel.description: Recent content in Health on UNIQsandbox | Architecture of Logic

item.title: ['Anxiety vs Depression ', ' Mental Health ', ' Look at the essence behind anxiety. Is it a lack of courage? Regretting the past leads to depression; worrying about the future leads to anxiety. Live in today. [25], [26] ']
item.description: [’ Look at the essence behind anxiety. Is it a lack of courage? Regretting the past leads to depression; worrying about the future leads to anxiety. Live in today. ‘, ‘25], [26]\n’]

item.title: ['Biohacking: Inflammation ', ' Health ', ' Inflammation and aging are caused by Omega-6 and sugar. Avoid seed oils; embrace olive oil, avocado oil, and butter. If you are in your 50s, strength training solves most pain. [42], [33] ']
item.description: [’ Inflammation and aging are caused by Omega-6 and sugar. Avoid seed oils; embrace olive oil, avocado oil, and butter. If you are in your 50s, strength training solves most pain. ‘, ‘42], [33]\n’]

item.title: ['Sleep is Cleaning ', ' Health ', ' Sleep is not a waste of time; it's a cleaning process. You need at least 6 hours for the brain to flush out toxins. Program your subconscious before sleeping. [44] ']
item.description: [" Sleep is not a waste of time; it’s a cleaning process. You need at least 6 hours for the brain to flush out toxins. Program your subconscious before sleeping. “, ‘44]\n’]

item.title: ['Diet: Ketogenic Approach ', ' Health ', ' Eat simple. Tofu, eggs, vegetables, and good fats. A ketogenic approach boosts metabolism. Stop eating when you are not hungry. [33] ']
item.description: [’ Eat simple. Tofu, eggs, vegetables, and good fats. A ketogenic approach boosts metabolism. Stop eating when you are not hungry. ‘, ‘33]\n’]

item.title: ['Routine is Mental Strength ', ' Mental Health ', ' Mental strength isn't about not crying; it's about your routine not collapsing even when you cry. Keep your daily rhythm. [46] ']
item.description: [" Mental strength isn’t about not crying; it’s about your routine not collapsing even when you cry. Keep your daily rhythm. “, ‘46]\n’]

item.title: ['Social Media Detox ', ' Digital Health ', ' Disconnecting for even a day resets your dopamine levels. Replace scrolling with reading or walking. [12] ']
item.description: [’ Disconnecting for even a day resets your dopamine levels. Replace scrolling with reading or walking. ‘, ‘12]\n’]

item.title: ['Exercise for 50s ', ' Health ', ' In your 50s, surgical pain is often solved by muscle. Focus on squats and lower body strength. [33] ']
item.description: [’ In your 50s, surgical pain is often solved by muscle. Focus on squats and lower body strength. ‘, ‘33]\n’]
